languages.text: {n}Вопреки странному спокойствию, охватившему Пощаду, вы отчетливо понимаете — этот человек не привык сносить подобных унижений. И прощать.{/n}
{n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вопреки странному спокойствию, охватившему Пощаду, вы отчетливо понимаете — этот человек не привык сносить подобных унижений. И прощать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}
{n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}
{n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}
{n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管悯慈一反常态地接受了这样的局面，但你很清楚，他并不习惯于忍受这样的侮辱，也并不习惯于原谅那些伤害过他的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管悯慈一反常态地接受了这样的局面，但你很清楚，他并不习惯于忍受这样的侮辱，也并不习惯于原谅那些伤害过他的人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マーシーの奇妙な冷静さとは裏腹に、この男がこのような侮辱に耐えることに慣れておらず、自分を不当に扱った者を許すことにも同様に慣れていないことは明らかだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マーシーの奇妙な冷静さとは裏腹に、この男がこのような侮辱に耐えることに慣れておらず、自分を不当に扱った者を許すことにも同様に慣れていないことは明らかだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de la sorprendente sangre fría de Mercy, está claro que no está acostumbrado a soportar afrentas, y menos a perdonar a quienes las cometen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de la sorprendente sangre fría de Mercy, está claro que no está acostumbrado a soportar afrentas, y menos a perdonar a quienes las cometen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré son sang-froid étrange, il vous paraît évident que Mercy n'a pas l'habitude d'être victime de ce genre d'humiliation ni de pardonner à ceux qui lui causent du tort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré son sang-froid étrange, il vous paraît évident que Mercy n'a pas l'habitude d'être victime de ce genre d'humiliation ni de pardonner à ceux qui lui causent du tort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trotz seiner merkwürdiger Gelassenheit ist dir eines völlig klar. Mercy ist niemand, der weiß, wie es ist, so eine Demütigung zu erfahren, und er weiß auch nicht, wie er jemandem vergeben soll, der ihm ein Unrecht angetan hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz seiner merkwürdiger Gelassenheit ist dir eines völlig klar. Mercy ist niemand, der weiß, wie es ist, so eine Demütigung zu erfahren, und er weiß auch nicht, wie er jemandem vergeben soll, der ihm ein Unrecht angetan hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tuhaf soğukkanlılığına rağmen bu adamın böyle küçük düşürücü durumlara tahammül etmeye de ona yanlış yapanları affetmeye de eşit derecede alışık olmadığını net bir şekilde görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Mercy's strange sangfroid, it is clear to you that this is a man unaccustomed to enduring such indignities, and equally unaccustomed to forgiving those who have wronged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuhaf soğukkanlılığına rağmen net bir şekilde görebiliyorsun ki bu adam böyle küçük düşürücü durumlara tahammül etmeye de, ona yanlış yapanları affetmeye de eşit derecede alışık değil.{/n}
